title: Nifty Looks Cautious Before RBI Decision And Indian PMI
text:
On analysis of the , in different time frames, I find that after a firm opening on October 4th, 2019 after finding some support with positive move shown by U.S. equity markets; Nifty looks to be facing a lot of resistance above 11,381; which shows the thick presence of bears above this level. No doubt that the investors look cautious before interest decision by the Indian Central bank within next few minutes; where a cut of 25 basis points is expected; but the announcement of Service PMI (September) is also to accompany this, which may reflect the turn of investors to create the fresh position. I find that the currently prevailing exhaustion in Nifty 50 and may extend heavy selling during the day; as the global equity markets have their focus toward the key U.S. job report that could help determine whether the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates further.

Finally, I conclude that the growing bearish pressure in and Nifty Auto may continue to extend more exhaustion in till weekly closing. I find that the growing bearishness in European and Japanese equity markets may also extend exhaustion in Nifty during the upcoming weeks.
